name: The Sky Is Falling!!!
description:
A fun little game about placing blocks of different randomized types and strengths to save the village from doom. 

left click to place blocks

alt+enter to go to fullscreen

thanks to spring spring for the music.

The different colors of blocks and their strengths:

Dirt: 2

Stone: 4

Bricks: 6

Metal: 8

Diamond: 10

Swirly Portal Thing: 15 (Type a name for this one in the chat and it might be added to this page)

There Is A  Big Surprise When You Play Long Enough (1000 seconds)
